name: Whosh
description:
Join Whosh in a little journey to restore colors in a gray, lifeless land. 

Made for Godot Italia's Summer Game Jam #2 - banner by @kunaace
Theme: "Vento / Wind" 

  • Godot Version - 3.2.2
  • Graphic - Paint.NET
  • Music - LMMS & Audacity 
  • Featuring a procedural soundtrack powered by the awesome SGM soundfont

Hope you enjoy <3
